Package org.apache.ignite.ml.math

Contains main APIs for distributed code algebra.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Destroyable
    Support for destroying objects that are managed outside of JVM.
    KeyMapper<K>
    Maps key objects to index in Vector or Matrix.
    Matrix
    A matrix interface.
    Matrix.Element
    Holder for matrix's element.
    MatrixStorage
    Data storage support for Matrix.
    MetaAttributes
    Interface provides support for meta attributes on vectors and matrices.
    OrderedMatrix
    Interface for matrix with particular order for storing entities.
    StorageConstants
    Support for different modes of accessing data storage.
    StorageOpsMetrics
    Storage and operation cost characteristics.
    Tracer.ColorMapper
    Double to color mapper.
    Vector
    A vector interface.
    Vector.Element
    Holder for vector's element.
    VectorStorage
    Data storage support for Vector.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Algebra
    Miscellaneous arithmetic and algebra functions.
    Blas
    Useful subset of BLAS operations.
    Constants
    Math constants.
    IdentityValueMapper
    Identity value mapper.
    Isomorphism<K,V>
    Function from K to V with defined inverse.
    MathUtils
    Miscellaneous utility functions.
    MurmurHash
    This is a very fast, non-cryptographic hash suitable for general hash-based lookup.
    Precision
    This class is based on the corresponding class from Apache Common Math lib.
    Tracer
    Utility methods to support output of Vector and Matrix instances to plain text or HTML.
    VectorUtils
    Some utils for Vector.

Package org.apache.ignite.ml.math Description

Contains main APIs for distributed code algebra.
